item.title: What to invest in 2020?
item.description: The problem There is one thing that I keep hearing from the media: You need to learn how to invest because of compounding interest. The problem is, though, it is a vague statement. As a young adult, I have never been trained to invest in the stock market, mutual funds, or real estate. All my life thus far has been around academia, research, and computers. There is an inherent flaw in the above statement.

item.title: 2020 - The Year in Books
item.description: A wishlist of books I’d like to read in 2020.
